title: 86/26/ECSC: Commission Decision of 27 January 1986 approving aids from the Kingdom of Belgium to the coalmining industry during 1985 (Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 January 1986
approving aids from the Kingdom of Belgium to the coalmining industry during 1985
(Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
(86/26/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Government of the Kingdom of Belgium shall notify the Commission by 31 March 1986 of details of the aids granted pursuant to this Decision, and in particular of the amount of the payments made and the manner in which they are apportioned.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 January 1986.
For the Commission
Nicolas MOSAR
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 63, 11. 3. 1976, p. 1.
